author: quotidiano.net
title: Ground News - War in Ukraine, today's news. Rain of Russian missiles and drones all over the country
text:
Summary by quotidiano.net Rome, December 29, 2023 — Massive Russian missile attack on all of Ukraine. The air alert sounded all over the country. Kiev, Lviv (which rarely receives attacks because of its position in the extreme west), Kharkiv, Odessa were hit. “Massive terrorist attack, rockets are flying over our cities again and civilians are being targeted. Ukraine needs support. We will be even stronger, we are doing everything to strengthen our air shield. But the wo… Share menu More

3 hours ago Read Full Article Portfolio.hu A ship ran into a Russian mine in the Black Sea during an air raid across Ukraine — Our War News Friday From Thursday to Friday, Russia used missiles and drones to attack several major cities in Ukraine, including Kiev, Kharkiv and Lviv. A Panamanian-flagged cargo ship ran into a Russian sea mine on Wednesday, injuring two people. Ukrainian forces retreated to more defensible positions near Robotine, allowing the Russians to reoccupy areas reclaimed during the summer Ukrainian counteroffensive.
2 hours ago Read Full Article

A ship ran into a Russian mine in the Black Sea during an air raid across Ukraine — Our War News Friday From Thursday to Friday, Russia used missiles and drones to attack several major cities in Ukraine, including Kiev, Kharkiv and Lviv. A Panamanian-flagged cargo ship ran into a Russian sea mine on Wednesday, injuring two people. Ukrainian forces retreated to more defensible positions near Robotine, allowing the Russians to reoccupy areas reclaimed during the summer Ukrainian counteroffensive.
